verses.name: Leviticus 8:16
verses.text: And he took all the fat that was upon the inwards, and the caul above the liver, and the two kidneys, and their fat, and Moses burned it upon the altar.

verses.name: Leviticus 8:17
verses.text: But the bullock, and his hide, his flesh, and his dung, he burnt with fire without the camp; as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Leviticus 8:18
verses.text: And he brought the ram for the burnt offering: and Aaron and his sons laid their hands upon the head of the ram.

verses.name: Leviticus 8:19
verses.text: And he killed it; and Moses sprinkled the blood upon the altar round about.
